item.title: Catherine Zeta-Jones Unpacks Wednesday and Morticia’s Strained Relationship as She Looks Ahead to Season 3
item.description: The actress who plays the matriarch of the Addams Family in the hit Netflix series explains why “some secrets should be left secret,” but “little white lie secrets should be exposed.”

item.title: A Haunting Lady Gaga and a Glammed-Up Addams Family Arrive at Nevermore
item.description: The ‘Wednesday’ costume designers detail the significance behind Gaga’s look and dish on all that went into the suits and gowns showcased at Nevermore’s season two fundraising gala.

item.title: ‘Wednesday’: Burning Questions and Predictions Ahead of the Season 2, Part 2 Premiere
item.description: Is Wednesday really dead? Who will try to kill Enid? And what’s going on with Slurp? THR breaks down the biggest mysteries before the Netflix show returns Sept. 3.

item.title: Wednesday Addams Through the Years: 9 Actresses Who Have Played the Iconic Character
item.description: From an animated endeavor with Chloë Grace Moretz to the modernly beloved Jenna Ortega, there are several people who have portrayed the legendary daughter of Morticia and Gomez Addams in film and TV.

item.title: ‘Wednesday’ Star Emma Myers Accepts Any Challenge Thrown Her Way — Including “Difficult” Part 2 Scenes
item.description: Taking on the role of bubbly werewolf Enid in the hit Netflix series has been notably joyful for Myers who is “playing somebody so polar opposite.”
